metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45868 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 5.15.3, fs/quota/quota_tree.c does not validatethe block number in the quota tree (on disk). This can, for example, leadto a kernel/locking/rwsem.c use-after-free if there is a corrupted quotafile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-45868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-97-generic - 5.4.0-97.110
linux-image-5.4.0-97-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-97.110
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-97-generic - 5.4.0-97.110
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-97-lowlatency - 5.4.0-97.110
No subscription required

linux-image-5.13.0-28-generic - 5.13.0-28.31~20.04.1
linux-image-5.13.0-28-generic-lpae - 5.13.0-28.31~20.04.1
